title: Gunwitch

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose a player's house to perform a ritual at. Gain one ammo for each of their visitors, including you.
- At night, choose a player to shoot with your shotgun, consuming one ammo. You will powerfully rampage at their house.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The ritual magically exhausts you: you can't act on the night after performing a ritual.
- Detection immune except on nights where you're shooting.
- Start with one ammo.

desc:
Post 5248
*"This is a different kind of broomstick."*
